allthetrims.yacl.not_installed.message: YACL is required to edit the config in game, would you like to install YACL?
allthetrims.yacl.title: AllTheTrims Config
allthetrims.yacl.description.use_legacy_: The modern renderer uses a custom shader to render the dynamic trims, which is 9x more performant, however, the old renderer is present for shader compat.
allthetrims.yacl.description.debug: Modern renderer will render trim indexes. Generated texture files and palettes will be outputted to ".minecraft/att-debug/" to view the layered textures and resources that the legacy renderer uses.
allthetrims.yacl.description.palette_sor: How should the generated palettes be sorted?
allthetrims.yacl.description.override_ex: By default AllTheTrims only adds materials when they're not already present. Enable this to override the existing palettes with generated ones and support trim animating on them.
allthetrims.yacl.description.animate: Trim colours will cycle giving a wave-like effect. Enable "Override Existing Trims" to allow vanilla and other mods' trims to animate.
allthetrims.yacl.description.time_betwee: Animation speed, lower is faster. 0 for every frame.
allthetrims.yacl.description.interpolati: What method should the animated trims use to interpolate colours? This can help reduce the stark contrast between the start and end of a trim.
